mapper.select: SELECT * FROM inspection_characteristics ORDER BY insp_char
mapper.update: UPDATE inspection_characteristics SET insp_char = #{insp_char}, insp_char_name = #{insp_char_name}, qn_f = #{qn_f}, sample_qty = #{sample_qty}, AC = #{AC}, RE = #{RE}, USL = #{USL}, SL = #{SL}, LSL = #{LSL}, UCL = #{UCL}, CL = #{CL}, LCL = #{LCL}, unit = #{unit}, create_user = #{create_user}, create_date = #{create_date}, update_user = #{update_user}, update_date = #{update_date}, delete_user = #{delete_user}, delete_date = #{delete_date}, deletion_f = #{deletion_f} WHERE insp_char = #{insp_char}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inspection_characteristics(insp_char, insp_char_name, qn_f, sample_qty, AC, RE, USL, SL, LSL, UCL, CL, LCL, unit, create_date, update_date, delete_date, deletion_f) VALUES(#{insp_char}, #{insp_char_name}, #{qn_f}, #{sample_qty, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{AC, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{RE, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{USL, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{SL, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{LSL, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{UCL, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{CL, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{LCL, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{unit}, #{create_date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{update_date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{delete_date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{deletion_f})
